entry.title: Earth Sciences Thesis Defense
entry.summary: Sara Gallagher will present her thesis, "Depositional and Diagenetic Controls on Reservoir Heterogeneity: Upper Morrow Sandstone, Farnsworth Unit, Ochiltree County, Texas." 2 p.m. in MSEC 203.
entry.content: Sara Gallagher will present her thesis, "Depositional and Diagenetic Controls on Reservoir Heterogeneity: Upper Morrow Sandstone, Farnsworth Unit, Ochiltree County, Texas." 2 p.m. in MSEC 203.

entry.title: Master of Science for Teachers Seminar
entry.summary: Justin MacDonald, graduate student in Master of Science for Teachers, presents his independent study " How Student-Directed Inquiry Labs Affect Perceptions of Interest and Ability in Science." Public invited. 2 p.m. in Cramer 108.
entry.content: Justin MacDonald, graduate student in Master of Science for Teachers, presents his independent study " How Student-Directed Inquiry Labs Affect Perceptions of Interest and Ability in Science." Public invited. 2 p.m. in Cramer 108.

entry.title: Earth & Environmental Sciences Thesis Defense
entry.summary: Ben Rosandick will defend his thesis "Lithologic Controls on Geomechanical Properties of the Mancos Shale: Eastern San Juan Basin, N.M." 2 p.m. in MSEC 203
entry.content: Ben Rosandick will defend his thesis "Lithologic Controls on Geomechanical Properties of the Mancos Shale: Eastern San Juan Basin, N.M." 2 p.m. in MSEC 203

entry.title: Earth & Environmental Sciences Thesis Defense
entry.summary: Andrea McHugh-Towery will defend her thesis, "Vein Paragenesis and Stable Isotope Geochemistry of the Navidad Hill Ore Body, Navidad Ag-Pb-Cu Deposit, Chubut Province, Argentina." 9 a.m. in MSEC 203.
entry.content: Andrea McHugh-Towery will defend her thesis, "Vein Paragenesis and Stable Isotope Geochemistry of the Navidad Hill Ore Body, Navidad Ag-Pb-Cu Deposit, Chubut Province, Argentina." 9 a.m. in MSEC 203.

entry.title: Master of Science for Teachers Seminar
entry.summary: Weston Pringle, graduate student in Master of Science for Teachers, presents his independent Study, "Teaching Dendrochronology in a High School Classroom," Public invited. 2 p.m. in Cramer 108.
entry.content: Weston Pringle, graduate student in Master of Science for Teachers, presents his independent Study, "Teaching Dendrochronology in a High School Classroom," Public invited. 2 p.m. in Cramer 108.

entry.title: Snow Cone Social
entry.summary: Come out and enjoy FREE snow cones in front of Fidel! This special treat will be offered from noon to 3 p.m. So come out and enjoy some music, snow cones and meet the SGA!
entry.content: Come out and enjoy FREE snow cones in front of Fidel! This special treat will be offered from noon to 3 p.m. So come out and enjoy some music, snow cones and meet the SGA!

entry.title: SGA Pool Party
entry.summary: The SGA is hosting a pool party for all Tech students -- incoming students and continuing students! Free food, music and tons of fun! 6 to 8 p.m. at the Tech pool. So come out and enojoy some end of summer fun!
entry.content: The SGA is hosting a pool party for all Tech students -- incoming students and continuing students! Free food, music and tons of fun! 6 to 8 p.m. at the Tech pool. So come out and enojoy some end of summer fun!
